title: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management         NPS Arrowhead   The Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site is managed by the National Park Service, Southeast Region.  Sandra Taylor serves as Park Superintendent for the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, the Tuskegee Airmen National Historic Site, and the Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail. She may be contacted by calling 334-727-6390. Timothy Sinclair serves as Chief of Interpretation and Education for the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, the Tuskegee Airmen National Historic Site, and the Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail. He may be reached by dialing 334-727-3200.  Lean more about how the park is managed through its legislation and planning documents.
